title: Save Mayrina
content:
rs are after she dodges the question. She'll answer that they're at a farm north of Baldur's Gate, then change the topic to the Illithid parasite. You can find some choice consequences for this part of the conversation on the Sunlit Wetlands page, but for the most part this will not affect the Save Mayrina quest.

Whether you agreed to the deal or not, Auntie Ethel dismisses Mayrina and teleports her out of the room. If you approach the fireplace, your party will roll automatic Investigation Che
